CRITERIA.LABEL: Cardiac/Tele monitor for Digoxin Order
CRITERIA.TOOLTIP: Cardiac monitoring required for patients also receiving digoxin due to risk of heart block

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME: Replace Therapy Requires a Magnesium Lab result within the past 4 hours

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: Blood, ST collect, T;N, Once

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
CONTACT PROVIDER FOR IV REPLACEMENT
CRITICALLY LOW RESULT

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: Request IV replacement of Magnesium in Electrolyte Advisor.  Oral ordered, but IV need.  Magnesium level is critically low.

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
CONTACT PROVIDER FOR IV REPLACEMENT
Patient is now NPO
ORDER_SECTIONS.CONCEPT_NAME: [%{EASHOWMAGORDERS} AND NOT {EAPROTOCOLMAGIV} AND {EAPROTOCOLMAGORAL} AND NOT {EACRITERIANOTNPO} AND {EACRITERIAVALIDMAGRESULT4H} AND {EALABMAGBTW14AND19}%]

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: T;N, Request IV replacement of Magnesium in Electrolyte Advisor.  Oral ordered, but IV need.  Patient is now NPO.

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
NOTIFY PHYSICIAN
CRITICALLY LOW RESULT
Magnesium - Less Than 1.4 mg/dL

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 2 gm, Soln-IV, IV Piggyback, q1H Interval, Duration: 2 Doses, First Dose: Routine, Start date: T;N, Administer Over: 1 hr
ORDERS.COMMENT:
Total Dose = 4 gm; max rate 125 mg/min
Check Magnesium Level in AM and repeat replacement protocol daily until greater than 2.0 mg/dL

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
If patient is not NPO, and tolerating oral medications, the recommended choice of replacement route is to be oral.
Magnesium - 1.4 - 1.9 mg/dL

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 400 mg, Tab, Oral, q12H Interval, Duration: 2 Doses, First Dose: Routine, Start date: T;N
ORDERS.COMMENT:
Total Dose = 800 mg
Check Magnesium Level in AM and repeat replacement protocol daily until greater than 2.0 mg/dL.

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 2 gm, Soln-IV, IV Piggyback, Once, First Dose: Routine, Start date: T;N, Administer Over: 1 hr
ORDERS.COMMENT:
Total Dose = 2 gm; max rate 125 mg/min
Check Magnesium Level in AM and repeat replacement protocol daily until greater than 2.0 mg/dL

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
Oral Magnesium replacement ordered
Magnesium - 1.4 - 1.9 mg/dL
ORDER_SECTIONS.CONCEPT_NAME: [%{EASHOWMAGORDERS} AND NOT {EAPROTOCOLMAGIV} AND {EAPROTOCOLMAGORAL} AND {EACRITERIANOTNPO} AND {EACRITERIAVALIDMAGRESULT4H} AND {EALABMAGBTW14AND19}%]

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 400 mg, Tab, Oral, q12H Interval, Duration: 2 Doses, First Dose: Routine, Start date: T;N
ORDERS.COMMENT:
Total Dose = 800 mg
Check Magnesium Level in AM and repeat replacement protocol daily until greater than 2.0 mg/dL.

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
IV therapy ordered, or patient has an active NPO order
Magnesium - 1.4 - 1.9 mg/dL
ORDER_SECTIONS.CONCEPT_NAME: [%{EASHOWMAGORDERS} AND {EAPROTOCOLMAGIV} AND (NOT {EAPROTOCOLMAGORAL} OR NOT {EACRITERIANOTNPO}) AND {EACRITERIAVALIDMAGRESULT4H} AND {EALABMAGBTW14AND19}%]

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 2 gm, Soln-IV, IV Piggyback, Once, First Dose: Routine, Start date: T;N, Administer Over: 1 hr
ORDERS.COMMENT:
Total Dose = 2 gm; max rate 125 mg/min
Check Magnesium Level in AM and repeat replacement protocol daily until greater than 2.0 mg/dL

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
Magnesium Lab Orders

Last Magnesium Lvl Result Value: @concept{EALABMAG.value} mg/dL

Last Magnesium Lvl Result Date/Time: @concept{EATIMELASTMAGLVLIN.value}

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: Blood, ST collect, T;N, Once
ORDERS.COMMENT: Order a STAT Magnesium Level

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: Blood, AM collect, T+1;0400, Once
ORDERS.COMMENT: Order a Magnesium Level in the AM following completion of Magnesium Replacement

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: Blood, TS collect, T;N+60, Once
ORDERS.COMMENT: Schedule a Magnesium level for 1 hour after replacement therapy

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
!!!CONFIG ONLY!!!
Last Mag Level Lab ordered on: @concept{EATIMELASTMAGLVLOUT.value}
Last Mag Level Resulted: @concept{EALABMAG.value} was on @concept{EATIMELASTMAGLVLIN.value}
Last Magnesium Replacement ordered on: @concept{EATIMELASTMAGREPLACE.value}

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: Blood, ST collect, T;N, Once
400 mg, Tab, Oral, q12H Interval, Duration: 2 Doses, First Dose: Routine, Start date: T;N
ORDERS.COMMENT:
Total Dose = 800 mg
Check Magnesium Level in AM and repeat replacement protocol daily until greater than 2.0 mg/dL.

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 2 gm, Soln-IV, IV Piggyback, Once, First Dose: Routine, Start date: T;N, Administer over: 1 hr
ORDERS.COMMENT:
Total Dose = 2 gm; max rate 125 mg/min
Check Magnesium Level in AM and repeat replacement protocol daily until greater than 2.0 mg/dL

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 2 gm, Soln-IV, IV Piggyback, q1H Interval, Duration: 2 Doses, First Dose: Routine, Start date: T;N, Administer over: 1 hr
ORDERS.COMMENT:
Total Dose = 4 gm; max rate 125 mg/min
Check Magnesium Level in AM and repeat replacement protocol daily until greater than 2.0 mg/dL

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: Blood, ST collect, T;N, Once
Blood, AM collect, T+1;0400, Once
ORDERS.COMMENT: Schedule an AM collect for Magnesium level

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: Blood, TS collect, T;N+60, Once
ORDERS.COMMENT: Schedule a Magnesium level for 1 hour after replacement therapy

CRITERIA.LABEL: Cardiac/Tele monitor for Digoxin Order

Potassium - 2.5 - 2.9 mg/dL

40 mEq, Packet, Oral, q3H Interval, Duration: 2 Doses, First Dose: Routine, Start date: T;N

ORDERS.MNEMONIC: potassium chloride 10 mEq/100 mL intravenous solution
ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 10 mEq, Soln-IV, IV Piggyback, q1H Interval, Duration: 6 Doses, First Dose: Routine, Start date: T;N, Administer Over: 1 hr

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 20 mEq, Soln-IV, IV Piggyback, q1H Interval, Duration: 3 Doses, First Dose: Routine, Start date: T;N, Administer Over: 1 hr

CRITERIA.LABEL: Cardiac/Tele monitor for Digoxin Order
CRITERIA.TOOLTIP: Cardiac monitoring required for patients also receiving digoxin due to risk of heart block

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME: Replace Therapy Requires a Phosphorus Lab result within the past 4 hours

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: Blood, ST collect, T;N, Once

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
CONTACT PROVIDER FOR IV REPLACEMENT
CRITICALLY LOW RESULT

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: T;N, Request IV replacement of Phosphate in Electrolyte Advisor.  Oral ordered, but IV need.  Phosphorus level is critically low.

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
CONTACT PROVIDER FOR IV REPLACEMENT
Patient is now NPO
ORDER_SECTIONS.CONCEPT_NAME: [%{EASHOWPHOSORDERS} AND NOT {EAPROTOCOLPHOSIV} AND {EAPROTOCOLPHOSORAL} AND {ACTIVENPODIETORDER} AND {EACRITERIAVALIDPHOSRESULT4H} AND {EALABPHOSBTW10AND20}%]

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: T;N, Request IV replacement of Phosphate in Electrolyte Advisor.  Oral ordered, but IV need.  Patient is now NPO.

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
NOTIFY PHYSICIAN
CRITICALLY LOW RESULT
Phosphorus - Less Than 1.0 mg/dL

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 30 mmol, Soln-IV, IV Piggyback, Once, First Dose: Routine, Start date: T;N, Administer Over: 6 hr
ORDERS.COMMENT: Check Phosphorus Level 6 hours post infusion and repeat replacement protocol until Phosphorus greater than 2.0 mg/dL

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
If patient is not NPO, and tolerating oral medications, the recommended choice of replacement route is to be oral.
Phosphorus - 1.0 - 2.0 mg/dL

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 2 Packets, Oral, q6H Interval, Duration: 3 Doses, First Dose: Routine, Start date: T;N
ORDERS.COMMENT:
Total Dose = 6 packets = 48 mMol phosphorus and 42.6 mEq potassium
Mix contents of each packet with 75 mls of water or juice. Stir well and administer promptly.
Check Phosphorous Level in AM and repeat replacement protocol daily until greater than 2.0 mg/dL

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 15 mmol, Soln-IV, IV Piggyback, Once, First Dose: Routine, Start date: T;N, Administer Over: 4 hr
ORDERS.COMMENT: Check Phosphorous Level in AM and repeat replacement protocol daily until greater than 2.0 mg/dL

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
Oral Phosphorus replacement ordered
Phosphorus - 1.0 - 2.0 mg/dL

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 2 Packets, Oral, q6H Interval, Duration: 3 Doses, First Dose: Routine, Start date: T;N
ORDERS.COMMENT:
Total Dose = 6 packets = 48 mMol phosphorus and 42.6 mEq potassium
Mix contents of each packet with 75 mls of water or juice. Stir well and administer promptly.
Check Phosphorous Level in AM and repeat replacement protocol daily until greater than 2.0 mg/dL

ORDER_SECTIONS.CONCEPT_NAME: [%{EASHOWPHOSORDERS} AND NOT {EAPROTOCOLPHOSIV} AND {EAPROTOCOLPHOSORAL} AND {EACRITERIANOTNPO} AND {EACRITERIAVALIDPHOSRESULT4H} AND {EALABPHOSBTW10AND20}%]

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
IV therapy only, or patient has an active NPO order
Phosphorus - 1.0 - 2.0 mg/dL

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 15 mmol, Soln-IV, IV Piggyback, Once, First Dose: Routine, Start date: T;N, Administer Over: 4 hr
ORDERS.COMMENT: Check Phosphorous Level in AM and repeat replacement protocol daily until greater than 2.0 mg/dL

ORDER_SECTIONS.CONCEPT_NAME: [%{EASHOWPHOSORDERS} AND {EAPROTOCOLPHOSIV} AND (NOT {EAPROTOCOLPHOSORAL} OR NOT {EACRITERIANOTNPO}) AND {EACRITERIAVALIDPHOSRESULT4H} AND {EALABPHOSBTW10AND20}%]

Phosphorus Lab Orders

Last Phosphorus Lvl Result Value: @concept{EALABPHOS.value} mg/dL

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 30 mmol, Soln-IV, IV Piggyback, Once, First Dose: Routine, Start date: T;N, Administer over: 6 hr

ORDERS.COMMENT: Check Phosphorous Level in AM and repeat replacement protocol daily until greater than 2.0 mg/dL

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 2 Packets, Oral, q6H Interval, Duration: 3 Doses, First Dose: Routine, Start date: T;N
ORDERS.COMMENT:
Total Dose = 6 packets = 48 mMol phosphorus and 42.6 mEq potassium
Mix contents of each packet with 75 mls of water or juice. Stir well and administer promptly.

Blood, ST collect, T;N, Once
Blood, AM collect, T+1;0400, Once
